spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:script:
Enable('UPR_NIBBLE_POSN', Not(Eq('MADDR_BITS', '32')));\ Tooltip('UPR_NIBBLE_POSN', 'This setting is only relevant when the master address width is less than 32 bits.
When the master address width is less than 32 bits, it is possible to have the upper 4 bits of the master address appear in various positions in the (32 bit) address to the slaves. Essentially, it is possible to have the upper 4 master address bits appear at higher bit locations in the slave address, if this is desired.
When the master address width is equal to 32 bits, the slave address simply mirrors the master address.
The upper 4 master address bits are decoded to select the slave slot being addressed.');\ Enable('IADDR_OPTION', Not(Eq('MADDR_BITS', '32')));\ Tooltip('IADDR_OPTION', 'Indirect addressing is only relevant when the master address width is less than 32 bits.
Indirect addressing can be used to set the values of the upper bits of the (32 bit) slave address. The lower (master_address_width - 4) bits of the slave address are always sourced directly from the master address.
When the master address width is equal to 32 bits, the slave address simply mirrors the master address.');\ Enable('APBSLOT0ENABLE', Eq('SC_0', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT1ENABLE', Eq('SC_1', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT2ENABLE', Eq('SC_2', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT3ENABLE', Eq('SC_3', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT4ENABLE', Eq('SC_4', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT5ENABLE', Eq('SC_5', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT6ENABLE', Eq('SC_6', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT7ENABLE', Eq('SC_7', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT8ENABLE', Eq('SC_8', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT9ENABLE', Eq('SC_9', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT10ENABLE', Eq('SC_10', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT11ENABLE', Eq('SC_11', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT12ENABLE', Eq('SC_12', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT13ENABLE', Eq('SC_13', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT14ENABLE', Eq('SC_14', '0'));\ Enable('APBSLOT15ENABLE', Eq('SC_15', '0'));\ Tooltip('MADDR_BITS', 'This setting specifies the number of address bits driven by the master. The master address port of CoreAPB3 is 32 bits wide but not all of these bits may be driven, depending on what is mastering the bus.
When fewer than 32 address bits are driven by the master, any remaining upper bits of the master address port will be tied low.');\ Tooltip('SC_0', 'Check this option to add the slot 0 address space to the combined region. When slot 0 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_1', 'Check this option to add the slot 1 address space to the combined region. When slot 1 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_2', 'Check this option to add the slot 2 address space to the combined region. When slot 2 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_3', 'Check this option to add the slot 3 address space to the combined region. When slot 3 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_4', 'Check this option to add the slot 4 address space to the combined region. When slot 4 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_5', 'Check this option to add the slot 5 address space to the combined region. When slot 5 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_6', 'Check this option to add the slot 6 address space to the combined region. When slot 6 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_7', 'Check this option to add the slot 7 address space to the combined region. When slot 7 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_8', 'Check this option to add the slot 8 address space to the combined region. When slot 8 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_9', 'Check this option to add the slot 9 address space to the combined region. When slot 9 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_10', 'Check this option to add the slot 10 address space to the combined region. When slot 10 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_11', 'Check this option to add the slot 11 address space to the combined region. When slot 11 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_12', 'Check this option to add the slot 12 address space to the combined region. When slot 12 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_13', 'Check this option to add the slot 13 address space to the combined region. When slot 13 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_14', 'Check this option to add the slot 14 address space to the combined region. When slot 14 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Tooltip('SC_15', 'Check this option to add the slot 15 address space to the combined region. When slot 15 is included in the combined region it is no longer available as a separate interface for connection to a slave.');\ Validate('At least 1 APB slave slot must be enabled', Not(And(Eq('APBSLOT0ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT2ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT3ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT4ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT5ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT6ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT7ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT8ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT9ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT10ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT11ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT12ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT13ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT14ENABLE', '0'), Eq('APBSLOT15ENABLE', '0'), Or(And(Eq('APBSLOT1ENABLE', '0'), StartsWith('IADDR_OPTION', 'Direct')), StartsWith('IADDR_OPTION', 'Indirect')))));\

Indirect address sourced from IADDR input port

Indirect address sourced from register(s) in slot 10 space
Indirect address sourced from register(s) in slot 11 space

Indirect address sourced from register(s) in slot 13 space

Upper 4 master address bits do not appear in slave address
[27:24] (Ignored if master address width >= 32 bits)
[23:20] (Ignored if master address width >= 28 bits)
[19:16] (Ignored if master address width >= 24 bits)
[15:12] (Ignored if master address width >= 20 bits)
[11:8] (Ignored if master address width >= 16 bits)

spirit:vendorExtensions.actel-cc:description:
The CoreAPB3 component implements an APB3 (AMBA3 APB) fabric, which is backwards compatible with APB2 slave peripherals.
There is one APB3 Master interface.
